search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MyCase (mycase.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for MyCase is: [https://www.mycase.com/pricing/](https://www.mycase.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: MyCase Pricing | Start Your 10-Day Free Trial Today

#### Key Features

Case Management

Compile case-related notes, tasks, events, documents and relevant contacts in one place

Contact Management

Create contact groups; store all contact information

Legal Calendaring

Share calendar firm-wide linking cases to events, see SOL deadlines and due dates for tasks

Time Entry and Expense Tracking

Track time and expenses across client projects. Get time tracking reminders for common tasks.

Invoices

Effortlessly create invoices from time entries and expenses; share via email, text and/or client portal

Trust Ledger & Reconciliation

Display all transactions for trust accounts, and tie transactions to the appropriate receivable.

Trust by Case

Track trust balances per case, in addition to per client.

Multiple Bank Accounts

Add & manage multiple trust and operating accounts

Online Payments

Easily send invoices & collect payments online from your clients and leads.

LawPay Integration

MyCase and LawPay have merged to bring you the best legal case management and payments solution. Integrate with LawPay for fast, secure and easy payments collections at affordable rates.

Basic Financial Reporting

Includes reports for aging invoices, AR, trust account summary/activity, non-trust summary/activity, electronic payments, CC fees, SOL, time entry & expense (user/case)

Unlimited Document Storage

Unlimited secure document storage, with legal-specific document management tools.

Conflict Check Tracking

Track and flag potential conflicts performed by you and/or your firm

Client Portal

Let clients access their case updates, invoicing, and more, through an online portal.

#### Automation

Unlimited eSignature at no additional cost

Robust eSignature with built-in capabilities for multiple signers, text input and merge fields. Fully automate workflows with eSignature Templates.

Workflows

Automated workflows to easily streamline redundant tasks, events, and documents.

Client Intake Forms

Legal CRM

Track, manage, and convert more leads with online lead forms and built-in CRM functionality

Immigration Forms via Docketwise Integration

Automate the preparation of immigration forms for clients and matters stored in MyCase by sharing contacts and matters across platforms.

Docketwise subscription required

Docketwise subscription required

Document Generation

Create Word-based templates that automatically fill fields and output documents with necessary case information.

Smart Time Finder

Tracks any billable time you might miss during the day, keeping you on course to meet billing targets

Rules-Based Calendaring Powered by LawToolBox

Automate all your court-rules based deadlines in MyCase. Save time and avoid errors caused by manual entry, and protect your firm from malpractice lawsuits.

LawToolBox subscription required

LawToolBox subscription required

#### Communication

Unlimited 2-way Texting (includes accepting images)

A smart texting suite for communicating with clients & leads quickly and efficiently. Receive unlimited texts with images from clients. Easily link messaging to cases and contacts for later reference.

Chat

Speed up communication using the built-in instant messenger Securely facilitates conversations with colleagues that can be off-the-record or linked to a case.

Call log

Easily manage and log all incoming calls, so you can track time, and quickly reference ones for follow-up.

Messages

Secure client messaging tool to easily communicate with clients.

#### Premium Features

Custom Fields

Keep the information you need in one place by creating custom fields for cases, contacts and more.

Client Intake Management

All the tools you need to successfully convert your lead into a paying client, including customizable pipeline, consultation fee, retainer fees, agreements and more.

Premium Legal Calendar

Powerful additional features integrated within the firm-wide calendar, including event type filtering, automated event reminders to clients & leads, and much more.

Premium Billing

Maximize billing options with subscriptions, universal payment link, LEDES, account statements and timesheet calendar

Premium Invoicing

Includes batch billing, payment plans, auto apply interest

Firm Oversight

Includes data insights with graphs and charts for both your cases and financials.

Edit Documents from MyCase Browser

Open files from your browser in your preferred software, like Word or Adobe, and changes are synced back to MyCase without having to download or upload.

Integrations

Including Google, Outlook, Zapier, Smith.ai, LawToolBox, MailChimp, Dropbox, and more.

Mobile App

Use MyCase on the go with our mobile app for both Apple & Android.

Premium Reporting

Includes reports on case revenue, fee allocation , cases, contacts, leads, firm time entry & expense.

Advanced Document Management

Secure, unlimited cloud and local storage, and Advanced Document Automation: Automated legal document creation.

Desktop Drive for Files (PC & Mac)

MyCase Drive: Secure, unlimited cloud and local storage. 2-way file sync between your desktop and MyCase. Create and access documents from your file explorer and automatically sync to MyCase.

MyCase Open API

Open API: Connect more of the apps your firm uses to MyCase, for increased data sharing, better case organization, and more automated workflow processes.

Full Text Search

Search the contents of .pdf and .doc files (not just file names) to quickly run conflict checks or easily find the documents you’re looking for.

Get Started

**10-day free trial. No credit card required.**

By clicking “Get Started”, you assert that you have read and agreed to our [Terms of Service](https://www.mycase.com/terms/). For information about how we collect, store and use your personal data, please read our [Privacy Policy](https://www.mycase.com/privacy-policy/).

Plus, enjoy these features at no extra cost
-------------------------------------------

### Ongoing updates

At MyCase, innovation never stops. We’re constantly improving and expanding our platform to meet the evolving needs of law firms like yours. From introducing new integrations and streamlining workflows to enhancing security and performance, every update is designed to make managing your practice easier and more efficient.

### Training sessions

Our hands-on training sessions cover everything from the basics to advanced tips and tricks, ensuring every team member is equipped to maximize the platform’s potential. Learn how to save time, stay organized, and enhance collaboration with live, interactive sessions designed to fit your schedule.

### Award-winning support

We don’t just provide software—we deliver peace of mind. Our award-winning support team offers fast, personalized solutions to help your firm succeed, from onboarding to workflow optimization. With industry-leading response times and legal expertise, we’re here when you need us.

### Guided Implementation

We’ll guide you step-by-step, helping you configure the platform to meet your firm’s specific needs. Whether it’s importing your existing data, customizing workflows, or setting up essential features, we’re here to make the process easy and efficient.

FAQs
----

#### How does the free trial work?

MyCase offers a 10 day no-cost trial of our legal case management software. There is no credit card required to start. This is a risk-free trial to evaluate the benefits of MyCase case management software. If you cancel anytime within your free trial period, you will NOT be charged.

#### How many people can use MyCase?

While there is no limit to how many firm clients can access MyCase legal case management software, the number of firm employees who can use MyCase will depend on the number of active firm users you have added to your account.

#### How safe and secure is my work?

MyCase uses industry-standard SSL [security](https://www.mycase.com/features/security/), similar to eCommerce sites, financial institutions, and other secure web-based (SaaS) software solutions. All of your work, including the interactive wireframe, is password-protected and requires a login to access. Additionally, a national IT service provider, in a certified safe and secure environment, hosts and backs up all of your data.

#### How much does MyCase cost?

MyCase Basic plan is $39 per user/month (billed annually) or $49 per user/month (billed monthly). MyCase Pro plan is $89 per user/month (billed annually) or $99 per user/month (billed monthly). MyCase Advanced plan is $109 per user/month (billed annually) or $119 per user/month (billed monthly). Your monthly subscription rate depends on the number of active firm users you have added to your account. No long-term contract or setup fee is required.

#### What is included in the MyCase Advanced Package?

The MyCase Advanced package is the most full-featured package and starts at $99 per user/month (billed annually). The MyCase Advanced package includes all features in the Basic and Pro packages, PLUS MyCase Drive, Advanced Document Automation, and Full Text Search.

[MyCase Drive](https://www.mycase.com/features/mycase-drive/) is a document management solution that provides fast and easy desktop access to all your firm’s documents in one centralized cloud-based platform. MyCase Drive will automatically sync document changes between your desktop and MyCase account.

Full Text Search: Search the contents of .pdf and .doc files (not just file names) to quickly run conflict checks or easily find the documents you’re looking for.

[Advanced Document Automation](https://www.mycase.com/features/advanced-document-automation/): quickly and accurately generate MS-Word based legal documents from fee agreements to discovery requests to trusts and wills.

#### What if I want to cancel my account?

You can easily cancel your account within the Settings section at any time.

MyCase is customers’ top choice

MyCase offers transparent pricing structures to suit diverse legal practices. Pick the plan that meets with your firm's need. No CC required for Free Trial.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per user per month, with discounts for annual billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Cloud-based case management with end-to-end billing and online payments.
Robust firm management + client intake, contact communication, and key integrations.
Desktop document management, full text search, & Word-based advanced document automation.

additional_fees.fee_description: Per month support and maintenance + build fee
